articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.title: Gatorade’s new Gx Sweat Patch tests your sweat for smarter hydration - The Verge
articles.description: Gatorade has launched the Gx Sweat Patch, a fitness wearable that tests sweat to offer tips on better hydration during workouts. The Gx Sweat Patch is available in a package of two for $25.
articles.content:
$25 for a package of two patches
Image: Gatorade
